title: Ep. 93 - The Bullying, Intolerant Tactics of LGBT Activists
description:
LGBT activists have succeeded in shutting down another adoption agency. Once again, the viciousness and selfishness of the radical gay left is on full display. They are the worst bullies in America.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
